thread.title: Pele prefers Lionel Messi to Cristiano Ronaldo
thread.title_full: Pele prefers Lionel Messi to Cristiano Ronaldo - UPI.com

author: upi.com
title: Pele prefers Lionel Messi to Cristiano Ronaldo
text:
| License Photo KOLKATA, India, Oct. 12 (UPI) -- Brazilian soccer legend Pele thinks that Lionel Messi is a better player than Cristiano Ronaldo .
Messi beat out rival Ronaldo in August for the top UEFA award as Europe's best player.
"But, of course, in the last ten years, Messi was the best player," Pele said at a press conference in India.
"Lot of people compare Messi with Ronaldo. But they are two different kind of players. Roanldo is more (of a) scorer...more (of a) center forward. Messi plays more deeper. But both are fantastic."
The #legend "On behalf of all the Brazilians from home, I thank you for this warm welcome." #Pele #PeleinIndia pic.twitter.com/EYqZynyrbY 
— Atlético de Kolkata (@atletidekolkata) October 12, 2015 Messi is currently sidelined with a knee injury. In 2015, Messi has scored six goals in 10 appearances.
Ronaldo has 10 goals in nine appearances. In 2014, Messi netted 65 goals and had 29 assists in 66 games while Ronaldo netted 61 goals and had 22 assists in 56 games.
Pele , 74, said former England player Bobby Moore was the best he has ever seen.
"People don't take much notice of defenders," Pele said . "To me the best was Bobby Moore. But over the last ten years without a doubt it is Messi."
  Report: Zlatan Ibrahimovic headed to MLS Cristiano Ronaldo to star in documentary Lionel Messi named UEFA's best player
